mapper.select: SELECT pbl.libraryName pLibraryName,bl.libraryName,bs.id sampleId, bs.*,bm.*,bsr.problem,bsr.createTime jianduTime,bsr.rummager, bm.rummager gzdgRummager,bm.createTime gzdgTime FROM barn_sample bs LEFT JOIN barn_register br ON bs.pId = br.id LEFT JOIN barn_library bl ON br.libraryId = bl.id LEFT JOIN barn_library pbl ON bl.pLibraryId = pbl.id LEFT JOIN barn_manuscript bm ON bm.sampleId = bs.id LEFT JOIN barn_safety_report bsr ON bsr.sampleId = bs.id where bl.id = #{libraryId} and bs.position = #{position} and bs.barnTime like concat(concat('%', #{barnTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and bs.detectionState=2 ORDER BY bs.createTime
